name: Escape Zoom
description:
Escape Zoom is a 1-4 player escape room game where you have to find clues and solve the puzzles to escape. It is a competitive puzzle race where you must escape before the other team to win. New players can press b/o to join.

Controls

  • b/o- interact/join
  • Left trigger- sprint
  • a/x- jump
  • Right joystick- look around
  • Left joystick- move around

This game is a TSA competition for Video Game Design HS by Alan, Elijah, Mario, and Sydney
